Sentencas: Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x nanopowders were successfully synthesized by microwave-induced combustion process.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and electrical properties of Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: For the preparation, cerium(III) nitrate hexahydrate, samarium(III) nitrate hexahydrate, and urea were used for the microwave-induced combustion process.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and electrical properties of Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: The process took only a few minutes to obtain Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2, powders.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and electrical properties of Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x ceramics prepared by microwave-induced process sintered at 1400 degrees C for 3 h, the bulk density of Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x ceramics were over 95% of the theoretical density.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and electrical properties of Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x ceramics

Sentencas: The results revealed that Ce0.84Sm0.16O1.92 possessed the maximum electrical conductivity was 0.0287 S cm(-1) at 850 degrees C and the minimum activity energy, E-a was 0.9565 eV determined from 500 to 850 degrees C. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
Titulo: Microwave-induced combustion synthesis and electrical properties of Ce1-xSmxO2-1/2x ceramics
